settings.custom_liquid:
Earn Commission
With your own referal code

Earn a steady income when you make a % of all sales made by your followers when they use your bespoke referral code!

Free/Discounted Seacra Products
20% - 100% Product Discount

Depending on your social presence and engagement levels, we are willing to give 20% product discount to completely free Seacra ITEMS...

Win Freebies
Via our monthly competitions

As a Seacra Ambassador, you will automatically be entered into our monthly competition where you have the chance of winning product freebies.

Join Our Ambassador Program

Fill in the form below and we’ll review your application.

settings.heading: What is an affiliate link?
settings.row_content: Affiliate links are special URL links where you will be sending visitors. You will see the URL for different banners in your affiliate panel after you’ve logged in.

settings.heading: What happens once I’ve applied to become an ambassador?
settings.row_content: Once you register, you will get a confirmation email notifying you that you have applied as partner for the ambassador program of SEACRA®. You will need to verify your email address. We will review your application details and will let you know the results within 48 hours.

settings.heading: How do your ambassadors get paid?
settings.row_content: You can choose if you want to be paid by PayPal or directly into your bank account. Payments are issued in GBP and paid monthly.

settings.heading: How can I track my earnings?
settings.row_content: Keep track and up to date with your earnings by having full access to your panel and view your earnings under the order tab.

settings.heading: What is the sales commission?
settings.row_content: Any ambassador will earn a competitive 15% commission on each sale, made through the affiliate link. The more you sell, the more you make.

settings.heading: How do I become a Seacra ambassador?
settings.row_content: To become a SEACRA® Ambassador you have to fill in the form on this page and we will review your application.

settings.heading: What are the minimum requirement to join the program?
settings.row_content: While our program is free to join, we have a minimum requirement. We're looking for applicants with over 2,500 followers on a specific social media platform and we’re also looking at engagement rates.

settings.heading: My application was declined. What should I do?
settings.row_content:
We are really sorry to hear that your application was declined. If you believe your application was declined by mistake and should be reviewed, please email us at marketing@seacra.com.


There are many reasons we decline an application, but usually this happens when we are unable to verify the authenticity of social media accounts. Please read our Privacy Policy and Terms of Service policy for more information.
